reviewText: This Baywatch movie takes place in none other than Hawaii. It has the returns of the most popular stars including Mitch, CJ, JD, Caroline, Taylor, Summer, Lani, Hobie, Kekoa, Jason, Cort, Neely, Leigh, Eddy, and "Allison" (Stephanie look a like). The movie also has a returning guest star Cary Hiro-Yuki Tagawa as the villan Sato. It is a good TV movie and has great scenes of the Hawaiian Islands. As for the acting, you can judge that for yourself.

reviewText: I miss seeing the show Baywatch on tv, I'd watch the re-runs if one of the stations would air them!! David Hasselhoff is so handsome as Mitch and he is a good role model for all the lifeguards who work with him.. Just recently watched this movie on Youtube and thought it would make a nice DVD to add to my collection.. For all you ladies who love lifeguards, this is one movie you should purchase!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I have always been a big fan of the "Baywatch" t.v. series and when I came across this movie, I had to check it out. I really enjoyed it ! Several of the past characters (which are listed by another reviewer,so I won't repeat them) come together for Mitch's "Hawaiian Wedding". It was fun to see what the characters were up to now-Caroline is an actress,C.J. owns a cool club in Hawaii,Eddie and Cort are now filming wildlife,etc. During the course of the movie,some interesting romances develop between various characters ,which I thought was a fun twist. The movie was kind of a mini Baywatch reunion. It is really too bad more of the actors' on the show didn't participate. It would have been really cool to see more. Even so,this was a fun movie. Drama,action,attractive people and beaches (all the things that attracted me to Baywatch).I must say the cast looked great and it was fun to see some of my old favorites from the show. The scenery in Hawaii was wonderful,as well. If you like Baywatch,this movie is worth checking out!
Title: N/A
